00017         protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00018         {
00019             if (Session["PWAS_UserToEdit"] != null)
00020             {
00021                 ViewState["PWAS_UserToEdit"] = Session["PWAS_UserToEdit"];
00022                 Session.Remove("PWAS_UserToEdit");
00023             }
00024 
00025             if (ViewState["PWAS_UserToEdit"] != null)
00026             {
00027                 tableErrorMessage.Visible = false;
00028                 lblErrorMessage.Visible = false;
00029                 lblErrorMessage.Style.Add(HtmlTextWriterStyle.Color, "red");
00030 
00031                 //need to set as a constant later on
00032                 userId = Convert.ToInt32(ViewState["PWAS_UserToEdit"]);
00033 
00034                 IUserRepository userRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IUserRepository>();
00035                 user = userRepo.GetById(userId);
00036 
00037                 if (!IsPostBack)
00038                     populateInformation();
00039             }
00040             else
00041             {
00042                 Response.Redirect("adminView_ManageAccounts.aspx");
00043             }
00044         }

00049

00053             txtPhoneNumber.Text = user.homePhone;
00054

00056             ddCardType.SelectedValue = user.cc_type;
00057             txtExpDate.Text = user.exp_date;
00058             txtSecurityCode.Text = user.cc_scode;
00059             txtNameOnCard.Text = user.cc_nameOnCard;
00060

00062             txtBillAddressLine2.Text = user.b_address2;

00065             txtBillZipCode.Text = user.b_zip;

00074         protected void btnEditLoginInfo_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00075         {
00076             //Email address is used as username and cannot be empty
00077             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtEmailAddress.Text.Trim()))
00078             {
00079                 lblErrorMessage.Text = "Please enter required (*) information";
00080                 lblErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00081                 tableErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00082                 return;
00083             }
00084             //Passwords must match
00085             if (!txtNewPassword.Text.Equals(txtNewPasswordConfirm.Text))
00086             {
00087                 lblErrorMessage.Text = "Password fields do not match";
00088                 lblErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00089                 tableErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00090                 return;
00091             }
00092             //This information is already in the db and does not need to be saved again
00093             if (txtEmailAddress.Text.Equals(user.email) && String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtNewPassword.Text))
00094                 return;
00095 
00096             IUserRepository userRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IUserRepository>();
00097             User newUser = userRepo.GetById((int)Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID]);
00098 
00099             //If username is changed
00100             if (!user.email.Equals(txtEmailAddress.Text))
00101             {
00102                 bool userExists = userRepo.Users.Any(u => u.email.Equals(txtEmailAddress.Text));
00103 
00104                 //check to see if email already exists
00105                 if (userExists)
00106                 {
00107                     lblErrorMessage.Text = "Username (email) already in use";
00108                     lblErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00109                     tableErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00110                     //return email already in use error message
00111                     return;
00112                 }
00113 
00114                 newUser.email = txtEmailAddress.Text;
00115             }
00116 
00117             //if password is changed, add it to the db
00118             if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtNewPassword.Text.Trim()))
00119             {
00120                 //Should verify if correct formatting in this step
00121                 newUser.password = Security.MD5Encode(txtNewPassword.Text.Trim());
00122             }
00123 
00124             //userRepo.UpdateUserInfo(newUser);
00125             userRepo.SubmitChanges();
00126 
00127             lblErrorMessage.Text = "Request Completed";
00128             lblErrorMessage.Style.Add(HtmlTextWriterStyle.Color, "green");
00129             lblErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00130             tableErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00131         }
00132 
00133         protected void btnEditOtherInfo_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00134         {
00135             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtFirstName.Text.Trim()) ||
00136                 String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtLastName.Text.Trim()) ||
00137                 String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtPhoneNumber.Text.Trim()) ||
00138                 String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtBillAddressLine1.Text.Trim()) ||
00139                 String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtBillCity.Text.Trim()) ||
00140                 String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtBillState.Text.Trim()) ||
00141                 String.IsNullOrEmpty(txtBillZipCode.Text.Trim()))
00142             {
00143                 lblErrorMessage.Text = "Please enter required (*) information";
00144                 lblErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00145                 tableErrorMessage.Visible = true;
00146                 return;
00147             }
00148 
00149             IUserRepository userRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IUserRepository>();
00150             User newUser = userRepo.GetById((int)Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID]);
00151 
00152             newUser.firstName = txtFirstName.Text.Trim();
00153             newUser.lastName = txtLastName.Text.Trim();
00154             newUser.company = txtCompanyName.Text.Trim();
00155             newUser.homePhone = txtPhoneNumber.Text.Trim();
00156 
00157             newUser.cc_num = txtCreditCardNumber.Text.Trim();
00158             newUser.cc_type = ddCardType.SelectedValue;
00159             newUser.exp_date = txtExpDate.Text.Trim();
00160             newUser.cc_scode = txtSecurityCode.Text.Trim();

00164             newUser.b_address2 = txtBillAddressLine2.Text.Trim();
